bio:
Hi,

I’m Farrukh, and it’s a pleasure to have you visiting my Guru page and considering me for your Architectural needs.

I am a Professional Architect and Draftsman running a successful and vibrant Architecture Studio. I have many years of experience developing everything from small houses to large housing complex projects, and have extensive experience performing Planning, Design and 3D Photorealistic Rendering tasks.

Through a wealth of skills and knowledge, I’m able to offer my clients many different services in the Architectural field, including (but not limited to):
● Floor Plan Drawing
● Basic Modeling
● Advanced Modeling
● 3D Modeling
● 2D Modeling
● Rendering
● Animation
● Shop Drawing/Work Drawing
● Landscape Design
I use the best and most relevant software to complete these services, and am skilled in AutoCAD, ArchiCAD, Sketchup, 3ds Max+Corona+Vray and Lumion. If you have any questions about software you may want used, don’t hesitate to mention it in your opening message! I’ve worked with nearly every useful tool on the market, and can more than likely accommodate your request.

Outside of that, all I can say is that I strive to work and grow with the best clients around. I believe that we both help each other to improve through hard work, communication, and an open mind, and I try to bring these qualities with me to every project and every team meeting.

If you’re interested in that kind of experience, don’t hesitate to message me today! I’m always looking for great new clients and can’t wait to build your next Architectural project with you!

description.title: Writing
description: $5/hr   ·   Starting at $25
I have written, edited, proofread, rewritten and reviewed all types of written work for over 20 years, including full novels, short stories, a large variety of academic essays, dissertations, ebooks,

abstrac: I write and edit anything written in English, all types of fiction and non-fiction, in a very diligent manner, with the key focus on delivering accurate results and client satisfaction.
bio: I have written, edited, proofread, rewritten and reviewed all types of written work for over 20 years, including full novels, short stories, a large variety of academic essays, dissertations, ebooks, product descriptions, resumes, cover letters, articles, screenplays, business plans, websites, grammar questions, recipes, slide shows, poetry, letters, memoirs, invitations, quiz questions, emails and more. I can rewrite anything to improve the clarity and make it more polished and professional and I can write descriptions from scratch. I have written, edited and proofread extensively in both American English and British English. I can advise clients on rewriting, adding creativity to their work and improving their flow, structure and word choice, whilst pointing out plot holes or inconsistencies. Projects of any size are accepted.

I aim for the highest standards in clear, honest communication with all my clients to fully understand their brief and then provide a high quality service to ensure their satisfaction. I edit everything thoroughly to check all areas of grammar, punctuation, spelling, coherence and fluency.
